<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cape of Grand Entrances](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2457)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 85 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 600 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn cloak

**Bulk** L
</row>

**Access** Second-mark members of the Firebrands have access to this item.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This regal blue cape is crafted from a hefty yet elegant velvet embroidered with ornate silver stars and dragons. Falling in a cascade of fabric, the cape rustles and flows in all the right ways and hangs upon your shoulders in a way that flatters your form and figure. You draw the eyes of those around you and gain a +2 item bonus to your [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) checks.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> envision, Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** With a flourish of your cape, you make a grand entrance that draws the attention of those around you. You cast [_enthrall_](/Spells.aspx?ID=104) with a DC of 25. The spell gains the [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163) trait and loses the [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16) trait. You Sustain the Spell by continuing to sweep the cape about.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
